title: Philosophy
description: Delve into metaphysics, ethics, epistemology, and other fundamental branches of philosophical inquiry

compositions.title: Foundations of Metaphysics
compositions.description: An exploration of fundamental metaphysical principles

sections.title: Nature of Reality
sections.content: The study of metaphysics begins with questioning the nature of reality itself. This foundational inquiry examines the fundamental structures of being, existence, and the relationship between mind and matter.

sections.title: Causation and Dependencies
sections.content: Understanding the nature of cause and effect relationships is central to metaphysical inquiry. This exploration delves into questions of determinism, free will, and the interconnected nature of existence.

compositions.title: Theory of Knowledge
compositions.description: An investigation into the nature and limits of human knowledge

sections.title: The Nature of Knowledge
sections.content: Epistemology examines what constitutes knowledge, how it is acquired, and what distinguishes justified belief from opinion. This investigation forms the foundation for understanding human cognition and the limits of certainty.
